Where do I go to school?

I go to SMPN10 Balikpapan, a public junior high school located in the city of Balikpapan, Indonesia. It's a place where I learn many things every day—science, math, English, and other important subjects.
The school has a friendly environment, supportive teachers, and friends who make learning more enjoyable. SMPN 10 is not just about studying; it's also about growing, discovering who we are, and preparing for a better future.
